pages.text: $(d)Ectoplasm$() is a material that drops when Spirits are killed.$(br2)Spirits have a chance of spawning $(3)any time a mob dies$(). The chance increases closer to the full moon, and increases further if the Ender Dragon has ever been killed on the server.
pages.title: Ectoplasm

pages.text: Spirits $(c)can only be damaged via magic$().$(br2)Splash Potions, enchanted weapons, or certain items like the $(l:items/spectre_sword)Spectre Sword$(/l) are examples of ways to damage them.
